link_desc:
Template updated from The C7000 OA - EN already present

  • Does not work on my G3 and G2s because zabbix cannot parse the CPQRACK-MIB shotcuts.
  • HP changed their MIBs hierarchy and templates don't work anymore

Inspired from iLo official templates, using the SNMPv2-SMI::enterprises.232.22.2.3.X.Y.Z format in all discovery rules.

  • Discovery rules updated one by one
  • Items updated one by one
  • Added trigger and changed severity
  • Modified retention schedule 10d history 180d trends
  • Update discovery interval and checks modified

Was so boring to make that I decided to share it with the community.

Tested on Blade Center C7000 G2 and G3

Sysuptime change by SNMP-FRAMEWORK-MIB::snmpEngineTime.0 because it s not working anymore

Last modification : 08/03/2021 19:02 => corrected Typo and wrong trigger preprocessor
author: Juliette Lalande
